trans-unit.source: Provides a base implementation for channels that want to expose a dictionary interface to their properties.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底實作給想要向其屬性公開字典介面的通道接收。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties> class handles the complexity of asking the sinks in a channel sink chain for their properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties>類別會處理要求通道接收鏈結中的接收其屬性的複雜度。

trans-unit.source: After the channel constructs its sink chain (if applicable), it must set the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties.SinksWithProperties> property.
trans-unit.target: 通道會建構其接收鏈結 （如果適用） 之後，它必須設定<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties.SinksWithProperties>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level.
trans-unit.target: 此類別可讓連結要求和繼承要求在類別層級。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>立即呼叫者或衍生的類別沒有基礎結構的權限時，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission Value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties" />, you must implement the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Keys" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Item(System.Object)" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties" />，您必須實作<see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Keys" />屬性和<see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Item(System.Object)" />屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the channel properties associated with the current channel object.
trans-unit.target: 取得與目前通道物件相關聯之通道屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the channel properties associated with the current channel object.
trans-unit.target: 與目前通道物件相關聯之通道屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: Channel properties are used to configure the channel at run time.
trans-unit.target: 通道屬性可用來設定通道在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫端沒有基礎結構使用權限。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Indicates the top channel sink in the channel sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 指示通道接收堆疊中的頂端通道接收。

trans-unit.source: Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages that are flowing through the channel as well as the stream that is used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 通道接收提供外掛程式的點，可讓您存取流經的通道，以及可由傳輸機制來傳送訊息至遠端物件的資料流的基礎訊息。

trans-unit.source: Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the messages are serialized and transported.
trans-unit.target: 通道接收鏈結中的通道接收提供者，連結在一起並且所有的通道訊息流經此鏈結之前序列化和傳輸訊息。
